mapper.insert:
SELECT place_id_seq.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into splace ( place_id, place_name, place_address, place_content, place_start, place_end, place_count, place_price, place_latitude, place_longitude, place_cat ) values ( #{place_id, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{place_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{place_address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{place_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{place_start, jdbcType=DATE}, #{place_end, jdbcType=DATE}, #{place_count, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{place_price, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{place_latitude, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{place_longitude, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{place_cat, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
